description.p: Déjà Dup is a simple backup tool. It allows you to backup the Right Way (encrypted, off-site, and regular) without sacrificing ease of use.
Déjà Dup is designed to integrate with the GNOME desktop and is completely free.

ul.li: Support for local, remote, or cloud backup locations, such as Amazon S3, Rackspace Cloud Files, and Ubuntu One
Securely encrypts and compresses your data
Incrementally backs up, letting you restore from any particular backup
